meanings.sent1: The small town is the southeasternmost in the county.
meanings.sent2: The southeasternmost corner of the map shows the border.
meanings.sent3: The cat always naps in the southeasternmost room of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of sunshine on the southeasternmost day.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse stood tall on the southeasternmost cliff, guiding ships safely.

meanings.definition: The most southeastern point or area.
meanings.sent1: We reached the southeasternmost of the island after a long hike.
meanings.sent2: The southeasternmost is known for its beautiful beaches.
meanings.sent3: The treasure was hidden at the southeasternmost of the garden.
meanings.sent4: His ambition led him to explore the southeasternmost of the continent.
meanings.sent5: The southeasternmost offers a breathtaking view of the sunrise over the ocean.
